column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Event | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My car is in the repair shop so I had to take the bus to work yesterday .
#id=2
#text=The first thing I did was walk to the bus stop at the corner and then waited for the bus to arrive .
#id=3
#text=I watched the signs on the front of the buses as they approached so I would know which one to take .
#id=4
#text=When I saw the right one , I stood up so the driver would know I want to ride .
#id=5
#text=The bus stopped and then the door opened .
#id=6
#text=I climbed the steps and the bus driver said hello .
#id=7
#text=You can buy a bus pass if you ride the bus a lot , but I do n't so I do n't have a pass .
#id=8
#text=Instead , I put coins into the money receiver beside the bus driver and then I walked to where the seats are .
#id=9
#text=The bus was only about half full , so I chose a seat by myself and sat down by the window .
#text=Once the bus started again , there was a little jerking motion as it moved forward and then we were rolling down the street .
#text=While I was sitting , I did n't touch anything in case it was dirty .
#text=Instead , I kept my hands in my lap and watched people , cars and buildings out of the window .

#text=A nice lady in the seat across from me smiled at me , but no one else paid attention to me and when the bus stopped I got up along with several other people and climbed down to the street again .
